name: RGB Climber
description:
You are a blob of paint who paints the level as he climbs. Try to reach the rainbow as a red, blue and green blob, but be careful not to touch any dangerous colors you leave behind from previous climbs.

PLAY IN FULL SCREEN MODE

Controls:

- Aim with Mouse

- Space to Launch

- You get 2 launches, which reset when you touch ground

Complete the climb to the rainbow with Red, Green and Blue to see the rare win screen

Good Luck :)

*Made for Mini Jam 111*
